view_definition:
SELECT p.id,
    p.organization_id,
    p.name,
    p.client_name,
    p.client_logo_url,
    p.status,
    p.target_go_live_date,
    p.created_by,
    p.created_at,
    p.updated_at,
    p.deleted_at,
    p.assigned_to,
    p.logo_path,
    p.brand_color,
    p.template_id,
    p.engagement_score,
    p.engagement_level,
    p.engagement_calculated_at,
    p.engagement_factors,
    jsonb_build_object('id', u.id, 'email', u.email, 'full_name', u.full_name, 'avatar_url', u.avatar_url) AS assigned_user
   FROM (projects p
     LEFT JOIN users u ON ((p.assigned_to = u.id)));
